LanguageData.VAE_StrengthenedByBond.label: strengthened by bond
LanguageData.VAE_StrengthenedByBond.description: This animal is bonded to one of the colonists and it will be considerably strengtened. However, if the bonded colonist dies, the animal will leave the map and be forever lost.
LanguageData.VAE_NoPain.label: no pain sensitivity
LanguageData.VAE_NoPain.description: This animal has a reduced pain sensitivity, and it takes longer to be downed due to pain.
LanguageData.VAE_StunnedByViciousAttack.label: stunned by vicious attack
LanguageData.VAE_StunnedByViciousAttack.description: This creature has been the target of a vicious assault.
LanguageData.VAE_SilkCovered.label: silk covered
LanguageData.VAE_SilkCovered.description: This creature has been attacked by a giant spider and is partially covered in strands of adhesive silk.
LanguageData.VAE_WallBreaker.label: wallbreaker
LanguageData.VAE_WallBreaker.description: This insectoid hulk is rampaging ravenously and will crush walls and other structures in its path.
LanguageData.VAE_BleedingWound.label: bleeding wounds
LanguageData.VAE_BleedingWound.description: A bleeding wound that continues to cause blood loss for quite some time after the initial attack.
LanguageData.VAE_BleedingWound.stages.0.label: bleeding wounds, minor
LanguageData.VAE_BleedingWound.stages.1.label: bleeding wounds, moderate
LanguageData.VAE_BleedingWound.stages.2.label: bleeding wounds, serious
LanguageData.VAE_OpenWound.label: open wound
